label: Product Search
description: Search for products in the search tool

defaultOutputs.name: Brand
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Brand name of the product (e.g. "Curlsmith", "The Ordinary", "Divi").

defaultOutputs.name: Product
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Product name or title (e.g. "Full Lengths Density Elixir", "Multi-Peptide Serum for Hair Density").

defaultOutputs.name: Ingredients
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Comma-separated list of ingredients in the product formulation.

defaultOutputs.name: Description
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Product description explaining its purpose, benefits, and usage.

defaultOutputs.name: Format
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Product format or delivery method (e.g. "Dropper serum", "Nozzle serum", "Spray / mist").

defaultOutputs.name: Rating
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Product rating score (typically on a scale of 1-5).

defaultOutputs.name: Review Count
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Total number of customer reviews for the product.

configSchema.label: Search Query
configSchema.placeholder: Enter product name, compounds, effects, or other search terms...
configSchema.tooltip: Text search query for products. You can search by product name, key compounds, desired effects, or other product attributes.

configSchema.label: Region
configSchema.tooltip: Select the continent/region to filter product search results.
